casebody.data:
PREVENT SANCTUARY CITIES, a Registered Nevada Political Action Committee; and Jeremy Hughes, in His Capacity as President of Prevent Sanctuary Cities PAC, Appellants,
v.
Michael HALEY, an Individual; Theresa Navarro, an Individual; Tu Casa Latina, a Non-Profit Organization; and Barbara Cegavske, in Her Official Capacity as Secretary of State of Nevada, Respondents. No. 74966 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 16, 2018

Reverse. Affirm. Remand.
